SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT071
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is the response to an MT 070 Undelivered SSI Update Notification Report Request. It contains information about undelivered MT 671 SSI Update Notification messages as requested in the MT 070 request message.
From: FIN To: User
Format The format of this message can be broken down logically into two groups of fields as follows: • Report details • Information on undelivered MT 671 messages (repeatable) • Count of undelivered MT 671 messages

SystemField.Name: section-number
SystemField.description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, to identify the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: section-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, to identify the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SystemField.Name: total-sections
SystemField.description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: total-sections
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SystemField.Name: date
SystemField.description: Date, in GMT, of report generation

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: time
SystemField.description: Time, in GMT, of report generation

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: mir
SystemField.description: Message input reference of the MT 670 SSI Update Notification Request that corresponds to this report.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mir
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message input reference of the MT 670 SSI Update Notification Request that corresponds to this report.

SystemField.Name: required-info
SystemField.description:
Type of information to be requested, where:
1 = count and individual message status 2 = count only

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: required-info
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Type of information to be requested, where:
1 = count and individual message status 2 = count only

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: swift-address
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Complete 12-character address, including LT code and branch code, or default branch code XXX.

SystemField.Name: msg-status
SystemField.description: Message status (for example, whether rejected, aborted, no delivery attempt, and so on). See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of status codes

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-status
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message status (for example, whether delivered or aborted). See the SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

SystemField.Name: delivery-history
SystemField.description: Message delivery history, that reports on each delivery attempt. For each attempt, it contains: • Output time of MT 671 message • Message output reference • Accepted or rejected (Y or N) • An error code if rejected by the receiver Time in message output reference is local to the receiver.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: delivery-history
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message delivery history, that reports on each delivery attempt. For each attempt, it contains: • Output time of MT 671 message • Message output reference • Accepted or rejected (Y or N) • An error code if rejected by the receiver Time in message output reference is local to the receiver.

SystemField.Name: report-code
SystemField.description: Report error code. See the FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: report-code
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Report error code. See the FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one of the fields msg-count or report-code may be present."
